class.name: EditorExportPlatformExtension
class.description: External [EditorExportPlatform] implementations should inherit from this class. To use [EditorExportPlatform], register it using the [method EditorPlugin.add_export_platform] method first.

method.name: _can_export
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the specified [param preset] is valid and can be exported. Use [method set_config_error] and [method set_config_missing_templates] to set error details. Usual implementations call [method _has_valid_export_configuration] and [method _has_valid_project_configuration] to determine if exporting is possible.

method.name: _cleanup
method.description: Called by the editor before platform is unregistered.

method.name: _export_pack
method.description: Creates a PCK archive at [param path] for the specified [param preset]. This method is called when "Export PCK/ZIP" button is pressed in the export dialog, with "Export as Patch" disabled, and PCK is selected as a file type.

method.name: _export_pack_patch
method.description: Creates a patch PCK archive at [param path] for the specified [param preset], containing only the files that have changed since the last patch. This method is called when "Export PCK/ZIP" button is pressed in the export dialog, with "Export as Patch" enabled, and PCK is selected as a file type. [b]Note:[/b] The patches provided in [param patches] have already been loaded when this method is called and are merely provided as context. When empty the patches defined in the export preset have been loaded instead.

method.name: _export_project
method.description: Creates a full project at [param path] for the specified [param preset]. This method is called when "Export" button is pressed in the export dialog. This method implementation can call [method EditorExportPlatform.save_pack] or [method EditorExportPlatform.save_zip] to use default PCK/ZIP export process, or calls [method EditorExportPlatform.export_project_files] and implement custom callback for processing each exported file.

method.name: _export_zip
method.description: Create a ZIP archive at [param path] for the specified [param preset]. This method is called when "Export PCK/ZIP" button is pressed in the export dialog, with "Export as Patch" disabled, and ZIP is selected as a file type.

method.name: _export_zip_patch
method.description: Create a ZIP archive at [param path] for the specified [param preset], containing only the files that have changed since the last patch. This method is called when "Export PCK/ZIP" button is pressed in the export dialog, with "Export as Patch" enabled, and ZIP is selected as a file type. [b]Note:[/b] The patches provided in [param patches] have already been loaded when this method is called and are merely provided as context. When empty the patches defined in the export preset have been loaded instead.

method.name: _get_binary_extensions
method.description: Returns array of supported binary extensions for the full project export.

method.name: _get_debug_protocol
method.description: Returns protocol used for remote debugging. Default implementation return [code]tcp://[/code].

method.name: _get_device_architecture
method.description: Returns device architecture for one-click deploy.

method.name: _get_export_option_visibility
method.description: Validates [param option] and returns visibility for the specified [param preset]. Default implementation return [code]true[/code] for all options.

method.name: _get_export_option_warning
method.description: Validates [param option] and returns warning message for the specified [param preset]. Default implementation return empty string for all options.

method.name: _get_export_options
method.description: Returns a property list, as an [Array] of dictionaries. Each [Dictionary] must at least contain the [code]name: StringName[/code] and [code]type: Variant.Type[/code] entries. Additionally, the following keys are supported: - [code]hint: PropertyHint[/code] - [code]hint_string: String[/code] - [code]usage: PropertyUsageFlags[/code] - [code]class_name: StringName[/code] - [code]default_value: Variant[/code], default value of the property. - [code]update_visibility: bool[/code], if set to [code]true[/code], [method _get_export_option_visibility] is called for each property when this property is changed. - [code]required: bool[/code], if set to [code]true[/code], this property warnings are critical, and should be resolved to make export possible. This value is a hint for the [method _has_valid_export_configuration] implementation, and not used by the engine directly. See also [method Object._get_property_list].

method.name: _get_logo
method.description: Returns the platform logo displayed in the export dialog. The logo should be 32×32 pixels, adjusted for the current editor scale (see [method EditorInterface.get_editor_scale]).

method.name: _get_name
method.description: Returns export platform name.

method.name: _get_option_icon
method.description: Returns the item icon for the specified [param device] in the one-click deploy menu. The icon should be 16×16 pixels, adjusted for the current editor scale (see [method EditorInterface.get_editor_scale]).

method.name: _get_option_label
method.description: Returns one-click deploy menu item label for the specified [param device].

method.name: _get_option_tooltip
method.description: Returns one-click deploy menu item tooltip for the specified [param device].

method.name: _get_options_count
method.description: Returns the number of devices (or other options) available in the one-click deploy menu.

method.name: _get_options_tooltip
method.description: Returns tooltip of the one-click deploy menu button.

method.name: _get_os_name
method.description: Returns target OS name.

method.name: _get_platform_features
method.description: Returns array of platform specific features.

method.name: _get_preset_features
method.description: Returns array of platform specific features for the specified [param preset].

method.name: _get_run_icon
method.description: Returns the icon of the one-click deploy menu button. The icon should be 16×16 pixels, adjusted for the current editor scale (see [method EditorInterface.get_editor_scale]).

method.name: _has_valid_export_configuration
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if export configuration is valid.

method.name: _has_valid_project_configuration
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if project configuration is valid.

method.name: _initialize
method.description: Initializes the plugin. Called by the editor when platform is registered.

method.name: _is_executable
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if specified file is a valid executable (native executable or script) for the target platform.

method.name: _poll_export
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if one-click deploy options are changed and editor interface should be updated.

method.name: _run
method.description: This method is called when [param device] one-click deploy menu option is selected. Implementation should export project to a temporary location, upload and run it on the specific [param device], or perform another action associated with the menu item.

method.name: _should_update_export_options
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if export options list is changed and presets should be updated.

method.name: get_config_error
method.description: Returns current configuration error message text. This method should be called only from the [method _can_export], [method _has_valid_export_configuration], or [method _has_valid_project_configuration] implementations.

method.name: get_config_missing_templates
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] is export templates are missing from the current configuration. This method should be called only from the [method _can_export], [method _has_valid_export_configuration], or [method _has_valid_project_configuration] implementations.

method.name: set_config_error
method.description: Sets current configuration error message text. This method should be called only from the [method _can_export], [method _has_valid_export_configuration], or [method _has_valid_project_configuration] implementations.

method.name: set_config_missing_templates
method.description: Set to [code]true[/code] is export templates are missing from the current configuration. This method should be called only from the [method _can_export], [method _has_valid_export_configuration], or [method _has_valid_project_configuration] implementations.
